title: Asshole Rumpus Roundup 2: Collegiate Shenanigans Brigade
desc: Homestuck college AU focusing on a developing moirallegiance between Karkat and Gamzee, as well as pitch feelings between Dave and Gamzee.

title: Beneath Tricky Themes
desc: After breaking her arm, Takane spends some time complaining to her boyfriend, Haruka, about how she can't really play video games. Eventually, he suggests that she use her ability to enter technology to go into their friend, Shintaro's, computer so that she can have a bit of a break from having to deal with everything. ... As well as give the two of them an excuse to bother their favorite HikiNEET.

title: Chumlogs: Distant friends
desc: A couple of players chatting from different timelines. A Homestuck au thing between a couple of pals.

title: The Crazy Carnival
desc: Theres a little carnival in the middle of a forest, that only few remember and never willingly visit, but there are few that don't remember it, and stumble upon it. Miss Jayden being one of the few to discover it, and realise just how much more she was going to get out of it....

title: The Dragon Dave Thing
desc: Dragons AU, GBH<>Sufferer Backstory for The Grand Highblood and the Sufferer's moirallegiance and the origins of the Church of the Mirthful and the Alternian Empire.

title: Entrusted
desc: Two misunderstood misfits, a dragonling and a bandit join forces to take on the unforgiving worlds beyond their imaginations

title: The Fish Inside Authorities
desc: A (true) story of the struggle to get revenge for a dear friend, against the parasites that are fish. Also revenge for Donald Trump I guess, but that's more of an after thought.

title: Gaster Disaster Au
desc: Undertale: A game with many secrets and timelines. One secret being the little know door that holds one of the most controversial characters in it: W.D Gaster. But what happens when different versions of the same character from two different minds come together?: Well, many things, But within this segment, Gaster is in Dadsters universe but they find a way to make Gaster return back to his timeline.

title: Igknights & Co
desc: A strange creature that normally dwells underwater meets a creature that lives solely off of the flame encased inside of it's armor- one is territorial, one is young and foolish. What could possibly go wrong?

title: The Ironical Tag Team RP
desc: A moment for god for a young boy, and a desperate need for shelter for a young girl, the church welcomes them both with open arms and with a priest to speak the words of the bible, and to further welcome their stay...A priest who, strikes both the young boy and girl, in many, different ways, that will seem holy, and very, very unholy. Their story prevails through-out the rp, infact, even now, it hasn't stopped yet.

title: Magica.EXE Has Stopped Working
desc: Puella Magi AU; One magical girl's descent into despair threatens to delete the entire city, and the only one that can stop her is the only person who can't bring herself to finish it.

title: Masked Snowflake
desc: Alucard, Darth Vader, and Erik get stuck with children all living in the town of Bon Temps after the Vampire Civil Rights Movement.

title: Midnight Train
desc: It's midnight, and SHSL Secretary Lizzie Belle is on her way home after a busy day's work. Her peace is interrupted though by Ferris, SHSL Rollerskater.

title: Monochromatic Crimson
desc: Dangan Ronpa AU; When an ex-gangster has no one to turn to, the only road he walks is one that'd lead him straight into judgement

title: One Last Smile
desc: Frisk is on their deathbed and chara who is alive and now unable to age has to see them pass away and it follows the story of how chara accepts their death and meets frisk's reincarnation

title: Retribution
desc: A secret relationship between a poor dock worker and a servant girl leaves the latter dead at the hands of her rather unstable masters. In search of revenge, the man begins plotting against the very people who stole his love from him--and he plans it from right under their noses.

title: Silent HELL NAW
desc: A monochromatic couple spend the night playing a ruthless horror video game. Talking bags, looping halls, and a demon fetus. What could possibly go wrong?

title: The Strong Formal Elephants
desc: An very serious tale of love, betrayal, courage, and formality. The Strong Formal Elephants have gathered together in council to discuss what to do about the danger looming over their land. Will they prevail against the Sadnessâ„¢?

title: Sweet Siren And A Buffoon
desc: A story of a jester, and a young girl making an encounter....Which turns out to be a close friendship later on. And soon a quest is made. A quest for revenge, on the little Jingling Jester. And the girl he encounters, makes sure to take a very, tasty, revenge, despite how innocent and incapable she comes across.
